title: Christian values
text:
Christian values historically refers to <a href="value%20%28personal%20and%20cultural%29">values</a> derived from the <a href="teachings%20of%20Jesus">teachings of Jesus</a> <a href="Christ%20%28title%29">Christ</a>. The term has various applications and meanings, and specific definitions can vary widely between <a href="Christian%20denominations">denominations</a>, geographical locations and different schools of thought. The terms Christian values and family values are often used as a euphemism for <a href="familialism">familialism</a> by the <a href="Christian%20right">Christian right</a>. Christian values also relate to the <a href="Christian%20identity">Christian identity</a> in <a href="identity%20politics">identity politics</a>.
